delete_item: Are your sure deleting item from cart
our_story_description: Six years ago we started as a local coffee shop and coffee roaster with a Probatone 5.
how_we_roast_description:
We only use world-class professional coffee equipment.
Our roastery is exclusively equipped with Probat roasting machineries.
partners_sourcing_description: As a country that doesn’t produce green coffee beans, maintaining our fresh “crop-to-cup” principle comes with a certain set of challenges.
branch_one_description: Our ROC Choijin branch is located at the heart of the business district in Ulaanbaatar and is able to cater to both sit-in or take-away for our customers.
branch_one_location: 1st Floor, Choijin Suites, Sukhbaatar District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.
branch_two_description: The recently renovated ROC Drink Bar branch adds a new color to the coffee bars of Mongolia and serves special drinks tailored for both day and night
branch_two_location: 60th Building (South of State Department Store), 40th Myangat street, Sukhbaatar District, Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia.
order_additional_information: If the coffee order is placed before 12:00, it will be delivered on the same day during working hours. Please note that orders confirmed after 12 will be delivered within the next working day. Please note that if you order Sunday orders will be delivered on the 1st working day as deliveries are not made on a full day basis.
